name: everlast-intranet
description: Everlast Intranet PWA - Employee Communication Platform

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --prefix frontend --legacy-peer-deps && cd backend && npx prisma generate && cd ../frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build && mkdir -p public && cp -r ../frontend/dist/* public/
scripts.start: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy && node dist/main.js

author: Youssef George
